name: Quick Puzzles 2
description:
A new kind of puzzles in which you do not have to drag and drop elements, but just swap them by clicking on them. The game has 15 levels, each puzzle consists of 25 elements. At the beginning of the game, a hint is given for 5 seconds and then disappears. With the right decision, the game itself will move to the next level. There is my choice and you can start playing from any level. The difficulty of the game is simple, suitable for both adults and children.

control buttons:

1 - turn on sound

2 - turn off the sound

3 - go to the next level

ESC - exit to the level selection menu
